item-unknown.name: item-unknown
item-unknown.localised_description: This item is not available due to mod removal, it will be restored if the mod is re-enabled.

red-wire.name: red-wire
red-wire.localised_description: Used to connect machines to the circuit network using __CONTROL__build__.

green-wire.name: green-wire
green-wire.localised_description: Used to connect machines to the circuit network using __CONTROL__build__.

copper-wire.name: copper-wire
copper-wire.localised_description: Used to manually connect and disconnect electric poles and power switches with __CONTROL__build__.

landfill.name: landfill
landfill.localised_description: Can be placed on water to create terrain you can build on.

empty-module-slot.name: empty-module-slot
empty-module-slot.localised_description: An empty module slot in a machine. Used in upgrade planners to install new modules or uninstall existing modules.

land-mine.name: land-mine
land-mine.localised_description: Explodes when enemies are nearby, damaging and stunning them.

belt-immunity-equipment.name: belt-immunity-equipment
belt-immunity-equipment.localised_description: Prevents belts from moving the character.

personal-roboport-equipment.name: personal-roboport-equipment
personal-roboport-equipment.localised_description: Allows construction bots to work from your inventory.

personal-roboport-mk2-equipment.name: personal-roboport-mk2-equipment
personal-roboport-mk2-equipment.localised_description: Allows construction bots to work from your inventory.

night-vision-equipment.name: night-vision-equipment
night-vision-equipment.localised_description: Allows you to see more clearly in darkness.

energy-shield-equipment.name: energy-shield-equipment
energy-shield-equipment.localised_description: Provides an energy shield to protect the character.

energy-shield-mk2-equipment.name: energy-shield-mk2-equipment
energy-shield-mk2-equipment.localised_description: Provides an energy shield to protect the character.

discharge-defense-equipment.name: discharge-defense-equipment
discharge-defense-equipment.localised_description: Damages, pushes back and stuns nearby enemies when activated using the remote.

space-platform-foundation.name: space-platform-foundation
space-platform-foundation.localised_description: Can be placed in space to extend existing space platforms.

metallic-asteroid-chunk.name: metallic-asteroid-chunk
metallic-asteroid-chunk.localised_description: An asteroid chunk with high metal content.

carbonic-asteroid-chunk.name: carbonic-asteroid-chunk
carbonic-asteroid-chunk.localised_description: An asteroid chunk with high carbon content.

oxide-asteroid-chunk.name: oxide-asteroid-chunk
oxide-asteroid-chunk.localised_description: An asteroid chunk with high oxygen content.

promethium-asteroid-chunk.name: promethium-asteroid-chunk
promethium-asteroid-chunk.localised_description: An asteroid chunk only found when approaching the shattered planet.

yumako-seed.name: yumako-seed
yumako-seed.localised_description: Can be planted on yumako soil.

jellynut-seed.name: jellynut-seed
jellynut-seed.localised_description: Can be planted on jellynut soil.

overgrowth-yumako-soil.name: overgrowth-yumako-soil
overgrowth-yumako-soil.localised_description: Soil for [entity=yumako-tree] placeable anywhere in the green biome.

overgrowth-jellynut-soil.name: overgrowth-jellynut-soil
overgrowth-jellynut-soil.localised_description: Soil for [entity=jellystem] placeable anywhere in the red biome.

ice-platform.name: ice-platform
ice-platform.localised_description: A stable floating platform of ice for sufficiently cold planets. Will melt if exposed to heat unless protected by a layer of concrete or other heat resistant material.

foundation.name: foundation
foundation.localised_description: Engineered structural foundation with heat shielding and deep screw piles. Can be placed on lava, oil ocean, and most water.

railgun-ammo.name: railgun-ammo
railgun-ammo.localised_description: Used to break even the biggest asteroids.

capture-robot-rocket.name: capture-robot-rocket
capture-robot-rocket.localised_description: Grapples on and captures the targeted [entity=biter-spawner] into [entity=captive-biter-spawner].

slowdown-capsule.name: slowdown-capsule
slowdown-capsule.localised_description: Reduces the movement speed of affected enemies.

artillery-targeting-remote.name: artillery-targeting-remote
artillery-targeting-remote.localised_description: Allows firing artillery manually from the map or the world.

yumako.name: yumako
yumako.localised_description: Nutritious farmable crop. Grants burst of health regeneration when eaten.

jellynut.name: jellynut
jellynut.localised_description: Slimy farmable crop. Grants burst of movement speed when eaten.

yumako-mash.name: yumako-mash
yumako-mash.localised_description: Grants burst of health regeneration when eaten.

jelly.name: jelly
jelly.localised_description: Grants burst of movement speed when eaten.

bioflux.name: bioflux
bioflux.localised_description: Highly nutritious blend of Gleba crops. Grants burst of both health regeneration and movement speed when eaten.

upgrade-planner.name: upgrade-planner
upgrade-planner.localised_description: Marks items for upgrade by construction robots.

deconstruction-planner.name: deconstruction-planner
deconstruction-planner.localised_description: Marks items for deconstruction by construction robots.

speed-module.name: speed-module
speed-module.localised_description: Increases machine speed at a cost of increased energy consumption.

speed-module-2.name: speed-module-2
speed-module-2.localised_description: Increases machine speed at a cost of increased energy consumption.

speed-module-3.name: speed-module-3
speed-module-3.localised_description: Increases machine speed at a cost of increased energy consumption.

efficiency-module.name: efficiency-module
efficiency-module.localised_description: Decreases machine energy consumption. Minimum energy consumption is 20%.

efficiency-module-2.name: efficiency-module-2
efficiency-module-2.localised_description: Decreases machine energy consumption. Minimum energy consumption is 20%.

efficiency-module-3.name: efficiency-module-3
efficiency-module-3.localised_description: Decreases machine energy consumption. Minimum energy consumption is 20%.

productivity-module.name: productivity-module
productivity-module.localised_description:
Machine will create extra products at a cost of increased energy consumption and reduced speed.
Usable only on intermediate products.

productivity-module-2.name: productivity-module-2
productivity-module-2.localised_description:
Machine will create extra products at a cost of increased energy consumption and reduced speed.
Usable only on intermediate products.

productivity-module-3.name: productivity-module-3
productivity-module-3.localised_description:
Machine will create extra products at a cost of increased energy consumption and reduced speed.
Usable only on intermediate products.

quality-module.name: quality-module
quality-module.localised_description: Allows machine to make higher quality products.

quality-module-2.name: quality-module-2
quality-module-2.localised_description: Allows machine to make higher quality products.

quality-module-3.name: quality-module-3
quality-module-3.localised_description: Allows machine to make higher quality products.

rail.name: rail
rail.localised_description:
Use to build straight rails manually or through the rail planner.
__CONTROL__build__ to build short paths directly.
__CONTROL__build-ghost__ to place long ghost paths.
__CONTROL__toggle-rail-layer__ to switch between ground and elevated paths.

space-science-pack.name: space-science-pack
space-science-pack.localised_description: Used by labs for research. Obtained by processing asteroids in space.

fluid-unknown.name: fluid-unknown
fluid-unknown.localised_description: This fluid is not available due to mod removal, it will be restored if the mod is re-enabled.

fusion-plasma.name: fusion-plasma
fusion-plasma.localised_description:
Ultra-high-temperature ions generated in [entity=fusion-reactor] and consumed by a [entity=fusion-generator]. It is not a normal fluid and cannot be moved in [entity=pipe], it can only be moved through the Fusion reactor and Fusion generator.
The temperature of plasma determines its energy value.
A quantity of plasma also represents that amount of coolant that travels with it, and the heated coolant is output by the Fusion generator as the plasma is used for energy.

signal-unknown.name: signal-unknown
signal-unknown.localised_description: This signal is not available due to mod removal, it will be restored if the mod is re-enabled.

signal-everything.name: signal-everything
signal-everything.localised_description:
If all input signals meet the condition, it will pass.
It is true when there are no inputs.
Output all input signals.

signal-anything.name: signal-anything
signal-anything.localised_description:
If any of the input signals meet the condition, it will pass.
It is false when there are no inputs.
Output the first input signal, or the first signal that passed all conditions, respecting signal order in both cases.

signal-each.name: signal-each
signal-each.localised_description:
Evaluates the condition for each input signal individually.
To pass completely, a signal has to pass all conditions.
Output every signal that passed all conditions.

signal-item-parameter.name: signal-item-parameter
signal-item-parameter.localised_description:
Special Wildcard signal
When used in schedule interrupt, it will match the first item that passes all wait conditions and replace the signal with that item.
This also replaces the rich text tag in the target stop name.

signal-fuel-parameter.name: signal-fuel-parameter
signal-fuel-parameter.localised_description:
Special Wildcard signal
When used in schedule interrupt, it will match the first fuel that passes all wait conditions and replace the signal with that fuel.
This also replaces the rich text tag in the target stop name.

signal-fluid-parameter.name: signal-fluid-parameter
signal-fluid-parameter.localised_description:
Special Wildcard signal
When used in schedule interrupt, it will match the first fluid that passes all wait conditions and replace the signal with that fluid.
This also replaces the rich text tag in the target stop name.

signal-signal-parameter.name: signal-signal-parameter
signal-signal-parameter.localised_description:
Special Wildcard signal
When used in schedule interrupt, it will match the first signal that passes all wait conditions and replace the signal with that signal.
This also replaces the rich text tag in the target stop name.

recipe-unknown.name: recipe-unknown
recipe-unknown.localised_description: This recipe is not available due to mod removal, it will be restored if the mod is re-enabled.

heavy-oil-cracking.name: heavy-oil-cracking
heavy-oil-cracking.localised_name: Heavy oil cracking to light oil

light-oil-cracking.name: light-oil-cracking
light-oil-cracking.localised_name: Light oil cracking to petroleum gas

ammoniacal-solution-separation.name: ammoniacal-solution-separation
ammoniacal-solution-separation.localised_description: [fluid=ammoniacal-solution] is gained by an [entity=offshore-pump] in the oceans of [planet=aquilo].

accumulator.name: accumulator
accumulator.localised_description: Stores a limited amount of energy when available production exceeds demand, and releases it in the opposite case.

beacon.name: beacon
beacon.localised_description: Transmits the effect of modules to nearby friendly entities. Transmission effects stack with diminishing returns.

boiler.name: boiler
boiler.localised_description: Burns fuel to turn water into steam.

heat-exchanger.name: heat-exchanger
heat-exchanger.localised_description: Uses heat energy to turn water into steam.

arithmetic-combinator.name: arithmetic-combinator
arithmetic-combinator.localised_description: Performs arithmetic operations on circuit network signals.

wooden-chest.name: wooden-chest
wooden-chest.localised_description: Stores finished items for collection, or as a buffer for raw materials.

iron-chest.name: iron-chest
iron-chest.localised_description: Stores finished items for collection, or as a buffer for raw materials.

passive-provider-chest.name: passive-provider-chest
passive-provider-chest.localised_description: Makes its content available to the logistic network.

active-provider-chest.name: active-provider-chest
active-provider-chest.localised_description: Sends its content to the logistic network.

storage-chest.name: storage-chest
storage-chest.localised_description: Long-term storage for the logistic network.

buffer-chest.name: buffer-chest
buffer-chest.localised_description: Requests specified items to be available for personal logistics and automated construction.

requester-chest.name: requester-chest
requester-chest.localised_description: Requests specified items from the logistic network.

crusher.name: crusher
crusher.localised_description: Can crush certain items, such as asteroids, into smaller chunks.

foundry.name: foundry
foundry.localised_description: Allows new smelting and metallurgy recipes.

captive-biter-spawner.name: captive-biter-spawner
captive-biter-spawner.localised_description: This creature requires food and will slowly starve if not fed. It will transform upon starvation. It can be captured by targeting [entity=biter-spawner] with [item=capture-robot-rocket]

electromagnetic-plant.name: electromagnetic-plant
electromagnetic-plant.localised_description: Critical for electromagnetic research and processes.

cryogenic-plant.name: cryogenic-plant
cryogenic-plant.localised_description: Can handle extremely low temperatures. Critical for cryogenic research and processes.

rocket-silo.name: rocket-silo
rocket-silo.localised_description: Used to launch items and players to space platforms.

stone-furnace.name: stone-furnace
stone-furnace.localised_description: Smelts raw materials into their smelted products.

recycler.name: recycler
recycler.localised_description: The recycler reverses most processes except smelting and chemistry, returning 25% of the ingredients on average. Fluid ingredients are not regained. Other items are usually returned 25% of the time (losing 75%), or turned to spoilage if they were biological.

steam-engine.name: steam-engine
steam-engine.localised_description: Consumes steam to create electric energy.

steam-turbine.name: steam-turbine
steam-turbine.localised_description: Consumes steam to create electric energy.

stack-inserter.name: stack-inserter
stack-inserter.localised_description: Stack inserter capable of filling transport belts in layers.

burner-mining-drill.name: burner-mining-drill
burner-mining-drill.localised_description: Mines raw material from resource deposits.

big-mining-drill.name: big-mining-drill
big-mining-drill.localised_description: A larger more powerful drill with a large mining area. Can mine harder ores.

offshore-pump.name: offshore-pump
offshore-pump.localised_description: Extracts fluid from bodies of water, lava, and various oceans.

power-switch.name: power-switch
power-switch.localised_description: Used to control the connections of the electric network. Can also be controlled by the circuit network.

programmable-speaker.name: programmable-speaker
programmable-speaker.localised_description: Connects to the circuit network in order to play alarms and musical notes, or show alerts.

radar.name: radar
radar.localised_description: Scans the nearby sectors, and actively reveals an area around it.

rail-chain-signal.name: rail-chain-signal
rail-chain-signal.localised_description: Reads the next signals in the path to allow better control of the trains.

rail-signal.name: rail-signal
rail-signal.localised_description: Defines the rail system into blocks, allowing multiple trains to run on the same network.

nuclear-reactor.name: nuclear-reactor
nuclear-reactor.localised_description: Uses uranium fuel cells to generate heat. The heat output increases when built next to other reactors.

heating-tower.name: heating-tower
heating-tower.localised_description: Generates heat from chemical fuels with very high efficiency. Does not stop burning when at maximum temperature. Passes heat to connected heat pipes which can be used for steam power, or to prevent freezing.

roboport.name: roboport
roboport.localised_description: Connects with other roboports to create the construction and logistic networks used by construction and logistic robots.

solar-panel.name: solar-panel
solar-panel.localised_description: During daytime it produces 100% of the power output which drops to 0% at night.

splitter.name: splitter
splitter.localised_description: Splits and/or joins transport belts' cargo 1:1.

fast-splitter.name: fast-splitter
fast-splitter.localised_description: Splits and/or joins transport belts' cargo 1:1.

express-splitter.name: express-splitter
express-splitter.localised_description: Splits and/or joins transport belts' cargo 1:1.

turbo-splitter.name: turbo-splitter
turbo-splitter.localised_description: Splits and/or joins transport belts' cargo 1:1.

underground-belt.name: underground-belt
underground-belt.localised_description: Used to allow a belt to cross entities or impassable terrain.

fast-underground-belt.name: fast-underground-belt
fast-underground-belt.localised_description: Used to allow a belt to cross entities or impassable terrain.

express-underground-belt.name: express-underground-belt
express-underground-belt.localised_description: Used to allow a belt to cross entities or impassable terrain.

turbo-underground-belt.name: turbo-underground-belt
turbo-underground-belt.localised_description: Used to allow a belt to cross entities or impassable terrain.

railgun-turret.name: railgun-turret
railgun-turret.localised_description: A long range electric cannon turret. Effective against enemies and asteroids.

tesla-turret.name: tesla-turret
tesla-turret.localised_description: Electrocutes a nearby enemy. The electric bolt can bounce to secondary enemies in an arcing chain.

flamethrower-turret.name: flamethrower-turret
flamethrower-turret.localised_description: Fires a stream of burning liquid at enemies.
